CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable as it does not validate or sanitize the input data. This can lead to SQL Injection if the data is used in a SQL query or Code Injection if the data is used in a function or eval. The function also does not handle errors properly which can lead to unexpected behavior or crashes.
